author: wsjcom
title: Dry the Starting Tear for PES’s Bankruptcy
text:
Your editorial “A Biofuels Bankruptcy” (Jan. 25) blames Philadelphia Energy Solutions’ (PES) impending bankruptcy on biofuels policy rather than its own antiquated technology, higher crude costs, poor investments and mismanagement.
Because of its age, geography and technology, PES has been in and out of financial difficulty for decades. Taxpayers have repeatedly bailed it out with subsidies, grants and environmental waivers. But rather than modernize its technology or retool its business plan so it is not captive to higher-priced...
